abstract: As of Tuesday, Google has the option to sell its 5 percent stake in Time Warner‘s AOL division. Google acquired the stake via a 2005 deal with Time Warner under which it invested $1 billion.
lead_paragraph: As of Tuesday, Google has the option to sell its 5 percent stake in Time Warner‘s AOL division. Google acquired the stake via a 2005 deal with Time Warner under which it invested $1 billion.

headline.main: Google Now Has Right to Sell AOL Stake
